content: That's a great list of online MBA programs. I'll definitely research them further. By the way, I've been thinking about my current job and how I can apply my Google Analytics skills to improve our company's data analysis and measurement. I've been struggling to keep up with some of the data analysis tasks at work, so I think a refresher course in statistics would be helpful. Do you know of any online resources or courses that can help me improve my statistics skills, especially in data analysis and visualization?
